Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-2906 affecting package wireshark for versions less than 4.0.8-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-2906 affecting package wireshark for versions less than 4.0.8-1. This CVE either no longer is or was never applicable.

Criterion.Comment: Package wireshark is earlier than 4.0.8-1, affected by CVE-2023-2906
